entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
This is my first blog totally constructed by myself.

It called WeirdCollection because I want to collect something that interest me.

The collection maybe useless, weird, non-sense, or whatever, only one benefit is that l like it.

Life is a long and boring journey, but Iâ€™d like to quest more and more.

Here is my own paradise.

Anything, I mean anything about me about life and about the world, even the universe.

Hello, my friend, thanks to come here and spent time with me.
